full_article:
I give the example of the self-catering project of bureaucracy to map its emerging tentacles. There is a syndicate out there that is creeping into our syndicates.
 
Shamsad Mortuza is Pro-Vice-Chancellor of the University of Liberal Arts Bangladesh (ULAB), and a professor of English at Dhaka University (on leave).
International University, Dhaka, and founding head of ICT and Education dept(s) at Bangabandhu Digital University. Email: director.blc@daffodilvarsity.edu.bd.
headline_1: Adopting online digital education in Bangladesh
